About me

My name is Alberto Pacheco and I am originaly from Portugal but currently living in Copenhagen, Denmark where I study Frontend Design at KEA - Københavns Erhvervsakademi.

I enjoy creating intuitive interfaces for websites and webapps as well as an unique user experience to make this interfaces more dynamic and alive.

I aspire to be a frontend designer and further more in the future a full-stack developer.

Skills

  • Very good understanding of HTML/CSS and JavaScript

  • Good understanding of design principles

  • Prototype building to test and present concepts

  • Good understanding of the use of CMS (Wordpress)

  • Library use ( NPM )

Education

AP in Multimedia Design, Frontend design
